name: test_NAF_17_2_0_verify_challenge_information_display
description:
Test Case: NAF-414
    As a user I want to be able to view challenge details
    Scenario: Challenge Information Display
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in   
    2. Go to "Challenges" tab
    3. Verify challenge information is displayed
descriptionHtml:
Test Case: NAF-414
As a user I want to be able to view challenge details
Scenario: Challenge Information Display

Steps:
1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in   
2. Go to "Challenges" tab
3. Verify challenge information is displayed
